Title: Establishes a co-occurring disorders patient bill of rights; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a co-occurring disorders patient bill of rights to be implemented by various agencies; requires a five-year plan for implementing such bill of rights.
LawCode: Add ยง19.47, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a co-occurring disorders patient bill of rights; and making an appropriation therefor
